entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
